sentences.english: A Buddhist temple stands proud in the middle of the city .
sentences.chinese: 一座佛寺傲然挺立在城市的中央。

sentences.english: Shifosi reservoir is an important reservoir of Liaohe main stream.
sentences.chinese: 石佛寺水庫是遼河干流的一座重要水庫。

sentences.english: A: Can you tell me how to get to the Jade Buddha Temple?
sentences.chinese: 你能告訴我玉佛寺怎麼走嗎？

sentences.english: A visit is a reminder of the growing religious fever sweeping China.
sentences.chinese: 參觀玉佛寺會讓你感受到正在中國興起的宗教熱。

sentences.english: Buddhist stupas are monuments holding holy relics.
sentences.chinese: 佛寺中的佛塔最初用來存放佛教聖物。

sentences.english: The Huating Temple, the largest Buddhist temple in Kunming, is also in the Western Hills.
sentences.chinese: 華亭寺是昆明最大的佛寺，也位於西山。

sentences.english: Can you tell me howgetthe Jade Buddha Temple?
sentences.chinese: 你能告訴我玉佛寺怎麼走嗎？

sentences.english: When would you like to visit the Jade Buddha Temple?
sentences.chinese: 您什麼時候參觀玉佛寺？

sentences.english: Can you tell me how to get to the ?
sentences.chinese: 你能告訴我玉佛寺怎麼走嗎？

sentences.english: In fact, there are two major sects of Buddhism in India, the Mahayana and the Hinayana .
sentences.chinese: 傳說玄奘在印度取經時曾住在一座大乘佛寺內。

sentences.english: It is a series of small temples to Budda and some sleeping and eating accommodation.
sentences.chinese: 這是一系列小的佛寺以及一些睡覺喫飯的設施。

sentences.english: We visited the Jade Buddha Temple, which is in the northwestern part of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 我們參觀了玉佛寺，他在上海西北邊。

sentences.english: Last November, Hermit Doctor and yaksha in Wat Phra Kaew, Bangkok.
sentences.chinese: 去年十一月，曼谷玉佛寺入口處的隱醫和夜叉。

sentences.english: Two thousand years ago near that spot was an old Buddhist temple.
sentences.chinese: 兩千多年前，臺址近旁有一座古老的佛寺。

definition: stupa/tower venerating the ashes of the Buddha
(literary) halls (of a palace or a temple)
the Baima or White Horse Temple in Luoyang, one of the earliest Buddhist temples in China
Hall of Great Strength, main hall of a Buddhist temple containing the main image of veneration 大雄[da4 xiong2]
